title: Aloorah, Shopian
author: Itzfew
content: Aloorah is a village located in Hermain tehsil, Shopian district, Jammu and Kashmir. It has a total of 173 families and a population of 929, comprising 466 males and 463 females. The village is served by educational institutions such as Govt Upper primary School, contributing to the community's educational development. The pincode for the village is 192303.
